mapper.select: select a.cm_num, b.sto_name, cm_delivery_time, cm_close, cm_goal_people, cm_sales, cm_status ,ord_detail_num, a.mem_email, ord_bundle_num, ord_quantity, ord_status, ord_add1, ord_add2, ord_phone, ord_request, ord_pay_method, c.prd_code ,prd_name, prd_price, prd_category, prd_upload from common_tb a left join store_tb b on a.sto_num = b.sto_num left join order_tb c on a.cm_num = c.cm_num left join product_tb d on c.prd_code = d.prd_code order by a.cm_num
